title: 1000th win
body: Hi I'm on 999 normal wins and looking for a riot member to play my 1000th. How can I get in contact with them?

replies.body: There will be a Rioter who will respond on here (I'm sure one will notice it when they get into the office today) and will volunteer to join you in your game. Also, congrats!

To get in contact with a riot member add them good ones for the 1000th win event is:
- Sephyre.
- Marauder.
